_source.short_desc: Automated patch management for OS and third-party applications, and updates from a single console for all your patching tools.
_source.long_desc: Automating your patch management means that all OS and third party applications (e.g. Adobe, Chrome, and Slack) will be automatically updated and protected against known vulnerabilities. The process involves automating how devices are scanned, inventoried, and updated. The system should identify all applications and missing patches to then download the latest patch updates released by the application vendors.
_source.target_audience: We serve IT and security teams of any size providing access to enterprise grade patching, software deployment, and configuration control through a centralized cloud console.

related_products.short_desc: A complete Mobile Device Management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory, and security of Apple devices.
related_products.features: Jamf Pro is a complete device management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory and security of Macs, iPads, iPhones and Apple TVs. Designed to automate vital tasks such as patch management while driving end-user productivity, Jamf Pro is the EMM tool that delights IT pros and the users they support by delivering on the promise of unified endpoint management for Apple devices. The IT experience you want is within reach. Request a free trial and become an IT superhero today.

related_products.short_desc: On-prem & cloud-based unified endpoint management and security tool that helps manage organization endpoints from single console.
related_products.features: Endpoint Central is a unified endpoint management solution that helps in managing servers, laptops, desktops, smartphones, & tablets from a central location. Using either an on-premise or a cloud-based UEM allows you to automate regular endpoint management routines like installing patches, deploying software, imaging & deploying OS, manage mobiles & BYOD devices, remote troubleshooting, modern management & much more! It also has a mobile app that allows you to manage endpoints anywhere, anytime!

related_products.short_desc: Simplified endpoint management for desktops, servers, and mobile laptops.
related_products.features: GoTo Central is a powerful, easy-to-use endpoint management solution enabling IT professionals to effectively monitor, manage, and secure their endpoint infrastructure. Whether you have remote employees or endpoints scattered across the globe, GoTo Central provides IT organizations with the speed, flexibility, and insight needed to increase productivity, reduce IT costs, and mitigate risk.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one Patch Management Software for MSPs and IT Pros. Fixed cost, unlimited devices. Try for free today.
related_products.features: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one patch management solution for MSPs & IT professionals. Atera includes everything you need and nothing you don't: Remote monitoring and management (RMM), patch management, remote access, network discovery, ticketing, PSA and help desk, reports, billing and so much more. Atera's disruptive fixed-cost pricing model, with unlimited devices and endpoints, helps IT businesses of all sizes grow with no extra costs. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Patch Manager Plus is an automated patch management software to patch Windows, Mac, Linux updates and 300+ third-party applications.
related_products.features:
Patch Manager Plus is an automated patch management software that provides enterprises with a single interface for all patch management tasks. Works across platforms, helping you patch Windows, Mac, Linux & 300+ third-party applications. 
You can automate the scan for missing patches, test & approve for hassle-free patching, customize deployment policies to meet business needs, decline patches & generate vulnerability reports. 
Patch Manager Plus is now available both on cloud and on-premise.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of MSPs and IT Departments use Kaseya VSA to automate patch management for OS, browsers & third party. Start your free trial!
related_products.features: Patching made easy. Install, deploy and update software across all endpoints. Remediate critical software vulnerabilities. Gain full control over patching including the ability to skip problematic patches through automation. Easily set up patch reports to see compliance across your entire environment and quickly identify the endpoints that need attention across OS and third-party applications.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud is an open directory platform for secure, frictionless access from any device to any resource, anywhere. JumpClouds mission is to Make Work Happen, providing simple, secure access to corporate technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Directory Platform gives IT, MSPs, VARs/Distributors, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities, their devices, and apply Zero Trust principles.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your servers, system and network hardware up to date by automating the discovery and delivery of missing patches with Pulseway!
related_products.features: Pulseway Patch Management software eliminates the need for manual updates thanks to patch automation and easy to set up policies, ensuring complete security of your business and clients. Secure your Windows endpoints by patching all the operating systems, update all your 3rd party applications, and automate your workload by scheduling patching updates on regular intervals.

related_products.short_desc: NinjaOne includes fully automated cloud-based patching for Windows, Mac, & Linux operating systems.
related_products.features: NinjaOne enables fully automated patching for Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems as well as robust Windows third party application patching. Our cloud-based patching architecture removes the requirement for complex infrastructure and allows IT leaders to patch any endpoint with an internet connection - regardless of network, domain, or location. Ninja is designed to fully automate your patch management process, improving security, driving compliance, and freeing up technician time.

related_products.short_desc: Automate integrates with industry-leading patch management solutions & contains numerous built in scripts & automated patch deployment.
related_products.features: Patch management is one of the largest concerns of IT service providers and their clients. With new vulnerabilities being discovered almost daily, keeping systems up-to-date with patches is often a full-time job, especially in larger environments. ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, integrates with industry-leading patch management solutions and contains numerous built in scripts & automated patch deployment.

related_products.short_desc: PDQ Deploy is the best way to automate your patch management. Update software, deploy scripts, and make configuration changes.
related_products.features: Automate your patch management with PDQ Deploy. Select the software you want to deploy (we have a pre-built library of over 200), specify which machines require updates, and set a preferred schedule for deployment. PDQ Deploy will automatically and silently apply updates - all without bothering end users.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Lifecycle Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Lifecycle Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) software synchronizes different stages of software development and deployment. It also monitors performance and updating of software applications throughout their life span. Here you'll find tools for modeling, design, requirements visualization, testing and build management, as well as fully integrated software suits that incorporate all of the above functionality. See also: Product Lifecycle Management software, Application Development software and Application Performance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Performance Management software manages and measures application performance levels and status, enabling accurate, real-time observations of system health and capacity. Organizations use the sophisticated diagnostic tools provided by Application Performance Management software to make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Application Performance Management software is related to Network Monitoring software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Monitoring software assesses and evaluates computer systems and networks in order to maximize availability of system resources. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Organizations use the diagnostic tools provided by Network Monitoring software to identify problem areas and make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. Network Monitoring software is related to Application Performance Management software, Network Security software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Server Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Server Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Server Management software provides monitoring and performance of managed servers. Administrators can isolate server problems, view all server components, and automate monitoring and reporting of server activity. Many server managers cover multiple devices and can provide alerts or auto corrections for network failures. Server Management software is related to Requirements Management software, Patch Management software, and Website Monitoring software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Website Monitoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Website Monitoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Website Monitoring software provides monitoring and performance alerts of websites and web-based applications. Companies can easily monitor uptime, web performance and transaction performance as well as quickly determine the location of performance failures. Website monitoring solutions are used in nearly every industry, and most provide real time performance alerts on failures involving HTTP, DNS, TCP and transaction response time. Website Monitoring software is related to Requirements Management software, and Patch Management software.

_source.short_desc: Automox is a cloud-based patch management platform - modern cyber hygiene to raise the world's security confidence.
_source.long_desc: Cloud-native and globally available, Automox enforces OS & third-party patch management, security configurations, and custom scripting across Windows, Mac, and Linux from a single intuitive console. IT and SecOps can quickly gain control and share visibility of on-prem, remote and virtual endpoints without the need to deploy costly infrastructure.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based suite of cybersecurity solutions that help businesses identify, analyze and remediate threats on a unified platform.
related_products.features: Cloud-based suite of cybersecurity solutions that help businesses identify, analyze and remediate threats on a unified platform.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a remote management software with enterprise-level security, 400+ app integrations, Gantt charts, calendars, Kanban and more.
related_products.features: Trusted by 20,000+ companies and over two million users, Wrike is a powerful remote monitoring and management software. Stay on track with Gantt charts, synced calendars, Kanban boards, time-tracking, real-time updates, and auto-assignment - all protected by enterprise-level security. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications and Adobe Creative Cloud so you can keep using the tools you rely on every day. Customize your workflow and reduce the need for emails, meetings, check-ins, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Cybersecurity application for IT administrators to prevent data breaches, covering a suite of devices, networks, and applications.
related_products.features: ESET Endpoint Security software is a cloud-based and on-premises application for internet security and malware protection. It has a global user base that comprises businesses of every size. Cloud sandbox technology enables users to protect their mobile devices, laptops, and desktops against ransomware, zero-day attacks, and data breaches. It features file, bot, and mail protection, along with remote device management, virtualization security, firewall set-up, and web control.

related_products.short_desc: LiquidPlanner's transformative project management uses predictive scheduling to dynamically adapt to change and manage uncertainty.
related_products.features:
LiquidPlanner is a project management solution for teams that want to plan, predict, and perform beyond expectations.  It's a new way to align your people, projects and priorities to ensure the right people are working on the right things at the right time.  

Predictive scheduling dynamically adapts to change and manages uncertainty, so you always know in real-time when work will be done.  Rated the best software for complex projects by PC Magazine, smarter planning is a click away.

related_products.short_desc: A complete Mobile Device Management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory, and security of Apple devices.
related_products.features: Jamf Pro is a complete device management solution for IT pros to simplify the deployment, inventory and security of Macs, iPads, iPhones and Apple TVs. Designed to automate device management while driving end-user productivity, Jamf Pro is the EMM tool that delights IT pros and the users they support by delivering on the promise of unified endpoint management for Apple devices. The IT experience you want is within reach. Request a free trial and become an IT superhero today.

related_products.short_desc: ISL Light remote support software lets you control a remote computer or mobile device. It's cross-platform, secure, fast, customizable.
related_products.features:
ISL Light is a web-based remote desktop solution that lets you access and control any Windows, Mac or Linux computer in seconds from any computer or mobile device or to provide ad hoc technical support to mobile device users.  Cross-platform, secure, high-speed screen sharing, cloud-based or on-premises license. 
Rich customization options allow you to rebrand the software to your own corporate identity and apply advanced security measures.

related_products.short_desc: Simplified endpoint management for desktops, servers, and mobile laptops.
related_products.features: GoTo Central is a powerful, easy-to-use endpoint management solution enabling IT professionals to effectively monitor, manage, and secure their endpoint infrastructure. Whether you have remote employees or endpoints scattered across the globe, GoTo Central provides IT organizations with the speed, flexibility, and insight needed to increase productivity, reduce IT costs, and mitigate risk.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one remote RMM Software solution for MSPs and IT Professionals. Try Atera for Free Today!
related_products.features: Atera offers the complete Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM) Software for MSPs and IT Professionals of all sizes. Atera includes everything you need in one integrated solution: Remote monitoring, PSA, help desk, ticketing, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, popular 3rd party integrations and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model allows users to pay a fixed and transparent monthly cost that includes unlimited devices and endpoints. Try Atera for free today.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to use and affordable remote control and remote IT administration tool for Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms.
related_products.features: Dameware is synonymous with affordable, reliable, and safe remote support software. SolarWinds offers two remote support solutions: on-premises or cloud based. Dameware Remote Everywhere (DRE) is the fast, simple, and lightweight cloud-based version designed to help IT professionals respond to and solve issues quickly. Dameware Remote Support (DRS) is an affordable and easy-to-use on-premises software designed to simplify and accelerate remote IT administration tasks.

related_products.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
related_products.features: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

similar_products.short_desc: N-able N-sight RMM is a complete solution that makes remote access, management, ticketing, and billing easier for MSPs and IT Pros
similar_products.features: N-able N-sight RMM (formerly N-able RMM) is a complete remote monitoring and management platform designed to make managing, maintaining, and protecting IT assets easy for IT service providers, MSPs, and in-house IT professionals. From a single web-based dashboard, you get fast access and support tools, robust remote monitoring and management with patch management and drag & drop automation included, and ticketing & billing. N-able N-sight RMM is built for those who need to do more and earn more

Whether you're an experienced IT managed service provider (MSP) or an hourly rate one-man shop, Automate can help you significantly improve your operational productivity and efficiency by leveraging the power of IT automation.
